author: Salvatore Calabrese
method: Place the vanilla vodka, elderflower cordial, lime juice, honey syrup and chilli slices into a cocktail shaker and shake well to combine. To serve, strain into a Martini glass and garnish with a red bird's-eye chilli.
ingredients: 50ml/2fl oz vanilla vodka,  1 tbsp elderflower cordial,  1 tbsp lime juice,  1 tsp honey syrup,  2 slices red chilli,  red bird's-eye chilli, to garnish
